channel.title: R on Programming Methods for Data Retrieval & Management
channel.description: Recent content in R on Programming Methods for Data Retrieval & Management

item.title: [Optional] R Basics 1
item.description: Welcome Welcome to to the course! This is the first of 2 sets of exercises introducing you to R, if you are not that familiar with it, or you would like to practice R basics before getting started. Lesson Preview Set up R and RStudio Install Packages Objects and assignment Component selection Types (character, numeric, vector, data, frame, list) Getting Started with R and RStudio To complete the exercises in this course, you will need to access RStudio.
